00022 struct MapKeyLessThan{

00026     double postolerance;

00030 struct NameMapKey {

00032     NameMapKey::NameMapKey(){}
00033     bool operator==(const NameMapKey&) const;
00034     bool operator<(const NameMapKey&) const;
00035     string name;
00036 };
